link-text: Philip L. Wright Zoological Museum: Sign the Petition - Protect Research at the Chicago Field Museum
link-description:
evopropinquitous:

umzoology:

BAD NEWS. In case you havenât heard, the Chicago Field Museum is preparing to slash its scientific research budget by $3million, (thatâs $3,000,000) and as a result are planning on cutting many curatorial positions. As a person who hopes to go on to work in a professional museum someday, aâ¦

Hey all - this is really important (and not just because I spent a fond winter there microscribing spider monkey scapulae; 3-D geometric morphometrics CAN benefit field-based studies!).

Please consider signing and reblogging! Keep the Field Museum viable!

Natural history museums protect the history, biology and memories of our past, vital to our present, and an essential gift to our future. Please sign!
